net.java.jddac.jmdi.fblock
Class BasicNCAPBlock

java.lang.Object
  net.java.jddac.common.fblock.Entity
      net.java.jddac.jmdi.fblock.FunctionBlock
          net.java.jddac.jmdi.fblock.NCAPBlock
              net.java.jddac.jmdi.fblock.BasicNCAPBlock
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigurationInterface, CommListener, SubscriberCallback
public class BasicNCAPBlock
extends NCAPBlock
implements CommListener

This is an instantiation of the NCAPBlock class. Provides minimal yet functional NCAP FunctionBlock functionality. This Block is responsible for maintaining state information about the NCAP and the Blocks within the NCAP. Most common use of the block is to retrieve information about other blocks in the system.

See Also:
NCAPBlock

Method Detail

destroy

public void destroy()
Cleans up the NCAP and gets rid of the Block instances. Performs the following:
  1. calls destroy() method on all blocks
  2. Removes all entries from Object Registry
  3. Removes all subscriptions

Overrides:
destroy in class NCAPBlock

getEntityMetaData

public ArgArray getEntityMetaData()
Returns the metadata for the NCAP. These are the NCAP-specific metadata supported by this method:
  1. ncapNetworkId
  2. manufacturerId
  3. modelNumber
  4. serialNumber
  5. osVersion
  6. description

Overrides:
getEntityMetaData in class FunctionBlock

metadata instance.

announceNCAP

public void announceNCAP(ArgArray extraInfo)
Send a publication announcing the NCAP is alive. If the info argument is not null then it's contents is included in the publication. The published ArgArray may contain the following fields:
Field Description
poweron If present, is set to true only on the first publication. Subsequent publications will have this field missing or set to false.
metaData An ArgArraycontaining descriptive meta data for the NCAP. This includes all information in the NCAP registry
probeid The current NCAP Network ID as returned by getNCAPNetworkId().

Parameters:
extraInfo - An ArgArray containing supplemental information.

configure

public void configure(ArgArray configuration)
               throws java.lang.Exception
Description copied from class: NCAPBlock

Generic Configuration interface

Specified by:
configure in interface ConfigurationInterface
Overrides:
configure in class NCAPBlock
Parameters:
configuration - contains incoming configuration parameters as named values.

string specified by 'instanceName' at object creation

Any additional properties included are available using the getRegistryValue(String) method and the setRegistryValue(String, Object) method.

Name Default Description
NCAPBlock.name A string or ConditionEval specification use to set the name of the NCAP at run-time. This allows properties set by other blocks to be used in determination of the NCAP name.
NCAPBlock.probeNetworkId null ID of NCAP. If null, one will be supplied by the infrastructure.
NCAPBlock.location null Location of the NCAP as specified by a Location instance.
announceNCAP false If true, an immediate publication will occur that announces the ncap and it's significant meta data on the 'announce' publication.
NCAPBlock.registry null Specifies an ArgArray of name/value pairs that specify various NCAP properties. Standard elements in the ArgArray include the following:
manufacturer Manufacturer name of this NCAP
modelNumber Model number of this NCAP
serialNumber Serial number of this NCAP
osVersion OS Version
description Human readable string of description of this instance.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
See Also:
ConfigurationInterface.configure(net.java.jddac.common.type.ArgArray)
